sourcesContent:
import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import { api } from '../services/api'; const Customers = () => { const [customers, setCustomers] = useState([]); const [loading, setLoading] = useState(true); const [searchTerm, setSearchTerm] = useState(''); const [selectedCustomer, setSelectedCustomer] = useState(null); useEffect(() => { fetchCustomers(); }, []); const fetchCustomers = async () => { try { const response = await api.getCustomers(); setCustomers(response.data || []); } catch (error) { console.error('Error fetching customers:', error); } finally { setLoading(false); } }; const mockCustomers = [ { id: 1, name: 'Alex Johnson', email: 'alex@email.com', phone: '(555) 123-4567', address: '123 Main St, Anytown, USA', lastRental: '2023-10-26', customerSince: '2022', avatar: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1472099645785-5658abf4ff4e?w=100&h=100&fit=crop&crop=face', rentalHistory: [ { id: 'ORD-00123', product: 'Pro Camera Kit', dates: '2023-10-20 - 2023-10-26', status: 'Returned' }, { id: 'ORD-00117', product: 'Lighting Setup', dates: '2023-08-15 - 2023-08-22', status: 'Returned' }, { id: 'ORD-00108', product: 'Audio Recording Bundle', dates: '2023-05-01 - 2023-05-10', status: 'Returned' } ] }, { id: 2, name: 'Emily Carter', email: 'emily.c@email.com', phone: '(555) 987-6543', lastRental: '2023-10-22', customerSince: '2023', avatar: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1494790108755-2616b612b786?w=100&h=100&fit=crop&crop=face' }, { id: 3, name: 'David Lee', email: 'david@email.com', phone: '(555) 234-5678', lastRental: '2023-10-15', customerSince: '2021', avatar: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1507003211169-0a1dd7228f2d?w=100&h=100&fit=crop&crop=face' }, { id: 4, name: 'Sarah Miller', email: 'sarah.m@email.com', phone: '(555) 876-5432', lastRental: '2023-09-30', customerSince: '2022', avatar: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1438761681033-6461ffad8d80?w=100&h=100&fit=crop&crop=face' }, { id: 5, name: 'Michael Brown', email: 'michael.b@email.com', phone: '(555) 345-6789', lastRental: '2023-09-18', customerSince: '2020', avatar: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1500648767791-00dcc994a43e?w=100&h=100&fit=crop&crop=face' } ]; const displayCustomers = customers.length > 0 ? customers : mockCustomers; const filteredCustomers = displayCustomers.filter(customer => customer.name.toLowerCase().includes(searchTerm.toLowerCase()) || customer.email.toLowerCase().includes(searchTerm.toLowerCase()) ); if (loading) { return (
Loading customers...
); } return (
{/* Header */}
S
Smart Systems
Dashboard Orders Products Customers Reports Settings
Admin admin@smartsystems.com
{/* Customer List */}

Customers

{/* Search and Filter */}
setSearchTerm(e.target.value)} className="w-full pl-10 pr-4 py-2 bg-gray-800 border border-gray-700 rounded-lg text-white placeholder-gray-400 focus:ring-2 focus:ring-green-500 focus:border-transparent" />
{/* Customer List */}
Name Contact Last Rental
{filteredCustomers.map((customer) => (
setSelectedCustomer(customer)} >
{customer.name}
{customer.email}
{customer.phone}
{customer.lastRental}
))}
{/* Customer Details Sidebar */}
{selectedCustomer ? (
{/* Customer Profile */}

{selectedCustomer.name}

Customer since {selectedCustomer.customerSince}

{/* Tabs */}
{/* Contact Information */}

Contact Information

{selectedCustomer.email} Email
{selectedCustomer.phone}
{selectedCustomer.address && (
{selectedCustomer.address} Address
)}
{/* Rental History */} {selectedCustomer.rentalHistory && (

Rental History (3)

{selectedCustomer.rentalHistory.map((rental, index) => (
{rental.product}
{rental.id}
Rented: {rental.dates}
{rental.status}
))}
)}
) : (
Select a customer to view details
)}
); }; export default Customers;
